org.primaresearch.dla.page.layout

Class PageLayout

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.primaresearch.dla.page.layout.PageLayout

  • public class PageLayout
extends java.lang.Object
    Class representing the layout and text content of a document page.
    Author:
    clc

      • createRegion

        public Region createRegion(RegionType type,
                           java.lang.String id,
                           RegionContainer parentRegion)
        Creates a region of the specified type.
        Parameters:
        type - Type of region (e.g. TextRegion, ImageRegion, ...)
        id - Preferred ID for the region (not guaranteed, check the returned region for the actual ID)
        parentRegion - Parent region (for nesting of regions)
        Returns:
        Region object

        public void removeRegion(org.primaresearch.ident.Id regionId,
                         boolean unregisterId)
        Removes the specified region object from the page layout.
        Parameters:
        unregisterId - If set to true the ID will be removed from the ID register and is free to be used again

        Throws:
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException

      • getRegionsSorted

        public java.util.List<Region> getRegionsSorted()
        Returns a sorted list of all regions. The sorting is primarily done by reading order and secondarily by y position.
        Returns:
        List of region objects

      • getRegionsSorted

        public java.util.List<Region> getRegionsSorted(boolean includeNestedRegion)
        Returns a sorted list of all regions. The sorting is primarily done by reading order and secondarily by y position.
        Returns:
        List of region objects

      • getRelations

        public Relations getRelations()
        Returns the container for all relations between regions.

      • changeTypeOfRegion

        public ContentObject changeTypeOfRegion(ContentObject region,
                                        RegionType newType)
                                 throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Creates a region object with the id of the given object and the new region type.
        Parameters:
        region - Region to change
        newType - New region type
        Returns:
        Region object with new type
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the input is not a region

      • iterator

        public ContentIterator iterator(ContentType contentType)
        Returns a new iterator for a specific page content type.
        Parameters:
        contentType - A specific region type or low level text object type. Use null for an iterator that includes all regions.
        Returns:
        The iterator

      • iterator

        public ContentIterator iterator(ContentType contentType,
                                Layer layer)
        Returns a new iterator for a specific page content type.
        Parameters:
        contentType - A specific region type or low level text object type. Use null for an iterator that includes all regions.
        layer - Restrict the iterator to this layer (use null for no restriction)
        Returns:
        The iterator
